actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to reservists and National Guard members deployed overseas in connection with the Persian Gulf conflict.

summary.text: States that for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code, Persian Gulf conflict service shall be treated as service in a combat zone. Includes active duty service as a member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces in connection with Desert Storm as Persian Gulf conflict service.

titles.title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to reservists and National Guard members deployed overseas in connection with the Persian Gulf conflict.
